item.title: Oracle on Pace to Add $190 Billion in Value on Blowout Forecast
item.description: Oracle Corp. is on track to add about $190 billion to its market value after a blowout revenue forecast for its cloud infrastructure business sent the stock soaring.

item.title: Oracle Surges on Earnings: Breaking Down the Numbers

item.title: Oracle Needs to Keep Sales Growth Humming After $200 Billion Run
item.description: The pressure is on for Oracle Corp. to deliver another quarter of accelerating revenue growth driven by spending on artificial intelligence after a run-up in its shares this year.

item.title: Banks Ready $38 Billion of Debt for Data Centers Tied to Oracle
item.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. are leading a roughly $38 billion debt package to fund data centers connected to Oracle Corp. in Wisconsin and Texas, according to peop
